Title: Blink
Plot: Tom and Diana are drugged with a hallucinogen, that was created from oil that was secreted from the hands of a 4400.
GuestStars: Matt Anderson,  Reynaldo Rosales,  Paul Belsito,  Adam Battrick,  Mercedes De La Zerda,  Nancy Sivak,  Christopher Kennedy,  Brian Dennehy,  John Prowse,  Aili Storen,  Richard Kahan,  Chilton Crane,  Linda Darl
